thread.title: Troopers searching for driver after pedestrian hit, killed crossing Pine Hills Road
thread.title_full: Troopers searching for driver after pedestrian hit, killed crossing Pine Hills Road

author: Stephanie Allen
title: Troopers searching for driver after pedestrian hit, killed crossing Pine Hills Road
text:
Troopers searching for driver after pedestrian hit, killed crossing Pine Hills Road Fatal hit and run crash Orlando Sentinel Stephanie Allen .
Troopers said the person was first struck by a vehicle heading south on Pine Hills Road. That vehicle stopped at the scene. 
A second vehicle, described as a dark grey sport utility vehicle, then ran over the person who was lying in the street. 
Trooper Steven Montiero said the SUV immediately “left the scene.” The pedestrian died from the injuries. 
No other details about the crash have been released. 
Troopers were asking anyone with information to call Crimeline at 407-4236-8477. 
This is a breaking news story. Check back with the Orlando Sentinel for updates.
